metadata.title: CVE-2021-38493 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Mozilla developers reported memory safety bugs present in Firefox 91 andFirefox ESR 78.13. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruptionand we presume that with enough effort some of these could have beenexploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR <78.14, Thunderbird < 78.14, and Firefox < 92.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
